page1.title: Create notes
page1.description: Start by creating new notes for your ideas, thoughts, and tasks. Capture everything on the go!

page2.title: Organize yourself
page2.description: Stay organized by categorizing your notes into books. Easily find and manage your notes with a simple organization system.

page3.title: Secure your data
page3.description: Mantain your data safe by limiting access using device authentification

page4.title: Customize experience
page4.description: Make app yours by changing the colors and more

page5.title: About
page5.description: To learn more about the app press the button below

home.welcome: Select a book from the sidebar to view notes
home.subWelcome: Or create a new one by pressing the + symbol

emptyList.subNoNotes: Create a new one by pressing the + symbol

deleteDialog.title: Delete
deleteDialog.book: The book and all its notes will be permanently lost

settings.deleteDescription: Delete all notes and books in the app
settings.lockDescription: Lock app using biometrics or PIN
settings.aboutDescription: To learn more about the app click here

share.note: Hey, here's my note created using Gnotes

notifications.emptyTitle: There are no notifications to show
notifications.emptyDescription: When you recieve a notification you will see it here
